name: Ng-conf-ng2-puzzle
tagline: A repository for a simple angular2 puzzle app
body:
### Description
The repository contains the code for the live demo/workshop held on May 6th 2016, at ng-conf 2016 extended in Pakistan organized by [Attribe Solutions](http://attribes.com)
The demo contains a simple application based on Angular2 which is actually a puzzle containing 4 inputs.
Each input can have either a value of 0 or 1. The user has to guess the value for each input and guess solve this puzzle. Once it is solved, the user sees a message of congratulations.

### About Me
I'm [Ahsan Ayaz] and working as a Senior Software Engineer at Unique Software Development LLC and I'm the CEO of [Owesome]. I'm an ng-freak and love to work on web technologies. Programming is my passion and the love of my life. I'm very enthusiast about technology meetups, building communities and contributing into open source technologies.

### Contact
Want to ask anything or maybe wanna work together on something exciting? 
Contact me on [LinkedIn](https://pk.linkedin.com/in/ahsanayaz) or tweet to [Ahsan Ayaz](https://www.twitter.com/ahsan_ayz)

[ahsan ayaz]: <https://github.com/AhsanAyaz>
[owesome]: <http://www.theowesomeapp.com>
